long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Earn free money for your everyday browsing

BrowseBucks is a free browser extension that passively earns you rewards for just browsing the web!

How it works

1. Add to your browser - Takes seconds and is 100% free

2. Browse like normal - Earn points automatically every day!

3. Redeem your points - Get rewards from your favorite brands

Take control and monetize your data!

Big tech earned $500 Billion last year From Selling Your Data. We believe you should get a piece of that. We do this by anonymously sharing your data with brands and rewarding you for it. Your personal information will never be shared. You’re already sharing data, shouldn’t you earn from it?

Leave us a review of your experience with BrowseBucks! We would love to hear from you and continue to improve the product.

BrowseBucks is currently only available in the US - we’ll be available in Canada and other regions soon!
